inclusion.criterion: Literacy: The subject must be able to read, comprehend, and record information in English.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Consent: The subject must have the ability to give informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type of subject: The subject must be seen in the outpatient setting.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory Instability: Hospitalization for respiratory disease within the last 6 months during study period and prior to Visit 0.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory Disease: Current diagnosis of cystic fibrosis, pneumonia, pneumothorax, atelectasis, pulmonary fibrotic disease, chronic bronchitis, or any other lower respiratory abnormalities other than asthma.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior Treatment of Asthma: Treatment for asthma with any medication (except for short acting inhaled bronchodilators) for 12 months or more prior to Visit 0
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Drug Allergy: Any immediate or delayed hypersensitivity reaction to any beta2-agonist or sympathomimetic drug
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory Tract Infections: Confirmed or suspected infection of the sinus, middle ear, oropharynx, upper respiratory tract, or lower respiratory tract within 28 days prior to testing
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other Concurrent Conditions/Diseases: Any clinically significant, uncontrolled condition or disease state that, in the opinion of the investigator, would put the safety of the subject at risk through study participation or would confound the interpretation of the results if the condition/disease exacerbates during the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant includes, but is not limited to: cardiac arrhythmia, congestive heart failure, coronary artery disease, Addison's disease, diabetes mellitus, dyspnea by any cause other than asthma, uncontrolled hypertension, hematological, hepatic, neurological, thyroid, peptic ulcer, or renal disease, immunologic compromise, current malignancy, current or quiescent tuberculosis.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of asthma and is currently using inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg. However, he doubled his oral corticosteroids in the past week, which may be a concern for eligibility.
